direct launch spring : http://localhost:8080/notice on chrome, not internet exp

since 24.12.2018 

java     port : 8888
keycloak port : 8080
react    port : 3000

Convention: same attributes from DB to Backend until frontend
-userid = 아이디
-username = 사용자 이름
-ordernumber = 주문번호
